title: Sunset Crater Volcano National Monument: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits & Reservations       Special Use Permits Special Use Permits are required for all commercial filming, special gatherings such as weddings, and any back country access. Visit our Permits Page for more information.   Research Permits Researchers wishing to do work inside the monument will need to go through our online permitting process here.
